replies.body: Which part of your League crashed? Was it the client or was it the game?
how to put up a picture

> [{quoted}](name=Ricky8411,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=asA4e1b7,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-08-15T15:15:49.918+0000)
>
> how to put up a picture

You can post a picture by uploading your image to an image hosting website, like imgur.com, and copying the direct link to your post. It'll automatically embed your picture into the post.
